GR14brhms5cu:9: vicāre tu mamātra syād ṛṣīṇāṃ sa ṛṣir gatiḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:10: yadyapy adhyāya-śata-yuk saṃhitā sā tathāpy asau /
GR14brhms5cu:13: tad evātra parāmṛṣṭaṃ tato hṛṣṭaṃ mano mama //
GR14brhms5cu:15: atra tat punar āmṛśya vyākhyātuṃ spṛśyate mayā //
GR14brhms5cu:16: atha śrīmad-bhāgavate yad uktaṃ ete cāṃśa-kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān
GR14brhms5cu:17: svayam [BhP 1.3.28] iti tad eva prathamam āha īśvara iti /
GR14brhms5cu:25: tan-nāma-vargāvirbhāva-kṛtā gargeṇa prathamam uddiṣṭatvena tathā yaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:26: mantram adhikṛtya so'yam ārambhaḥ tatrāgrataḥ paricitatvena mūla-rūpatvāt /
GR14brhms5cu:28: śrī-bhagavad-uktau - nāmnāṃ mukhyatamaṃ nāma kṛṣṇākhyaṃ me
GR14brhms5cu:31: sahasra-nāmnāṃ puṇyānāṃ trir-āvṛttyā tu yat phalam /
GR14brhms5cu:32: ekāvṛttyā tu kṛṣṇasya nāmaikaṃ tat prayacchati //
GR14brhms5cu:33: ity atra śrī-kṛṣṇasyety evoktaṃ yat tv agre govinda-nāmnā stoṣyate tat khalu
GR14brhms5cu:35: tad evaṃ rūḍhitvena prādhānyāt tasya iśvara ity ādīni viśeṣaṇāni / atha
GR14brhms5cu:38: āsan varṇās trayo hy asya gṛhṇato 'nuyugaṃ tanūḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:39: śuklo raktas tathā pīta idānīṃ kṛṣṇatāṃ gataḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:40: bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te /
GR14brhms5cu:41: guṇa-karmānurūpāṇi tānya ahaṃ veda no janāḥ // [BhP 10.8.13-14]
GR14brhms5cu:43: asya kṛṣṇatvena dṛśyamānasya prati-yugaṃ tanūr nānāvatārān
GR14brhms5cu:44: gṛhṇataḥ prakāśyataḥ śuklādayas trayo āsan prakāśam avāpuḥ / sa ca sa ca
GR14brhms5cu:45: śuklādir avatāra idānīṃ sākṣād asyāvatāra-samaye kṛṣṇāṅgataḥ etasminn
GR14brhms5cu:47: ataiva kṛṣṇe kartṛtvāt sarvotkarṣakatvāt kṛṣṇa iti mukhyaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:48: nāma / tasmād asyaiva tāni rūpāṇīty āha bahūnīti /
GR14brhms5cu:50: tan-nāmni prādhyānya-sūcakasya kṛṣṇasya tan-nāmnaḥ prādhānye labdhe -
GR14brhms5cu:51: kṛṣir bhū-vācakaḥ śabdo ṇaś ca nirvṛtivācakaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:52: tayor aikyaṃ paraṃ brahma kṛṣṇa ity abhidhīyate //
GR14brhms5cu:59: tasmād ayam arthaḥ - bhavanty asmāt sarve'rthā iti bhūḥ dhātv-artha ucyate
GR14brhms5cu:60: bhāva-śadavat sa cātra karṣter evārthas tasyaiva prāptatvāt / gautamīye
GR14brhms5cu:62: sattā-vācakam ity ukte ghaṭa-sattaiva gamyate na tu paṭa-sattā na vā
GR14brhms5cu:64: atha nivṛttir ānandas tayor aikyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena vyaktaṃ yat paraṃ
GR14brhms5cu:65: brahma sarvato'pi sarvasyāpi bṛṃhaṇaṃ vastu tat bṛhattamaṃ kṛṣṇa ity
GR14brhms5cu:66: abhidhīyate kintu kṛṣer ākarṣa-mātrārthatvena ṇa-śabdasya ca
GR14brhms5cu:70: brahma-śabdasya tat-tad-arthatvaṃ ca bṛhattvād bṛṃhaṇatvāc ca tad brahma
GR14brhms5cu:74: sattā-svānandayor yogāt cit paraṃ brahma cocyate // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:75: advaya-vādibhir api sattānandayor aikyaṃ tathā mantavyam / śābdikair
GR14brhms5cu:78: pravṛtti-hetur yat paramaṃ sa tad evocyate /
GR14brhms5cu:86: arthaḥ / uttarārdhe yasmād evaṃ sarvākarṣaka-sukha-rūpo'sau tasmād ātmā
GR14brhms5cu:90: tad evaṃ svarūpa-guṇābhyāṃ parama-bṛhattamaḥ sarvākarṣaka ānandaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:92: sa ca śabdaḥ śrī-devakīnandana eva rūḍhaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:96: tamāla-śyāmala-tviṣi śrī-yaśodā-stanandhaye para-brahmaṇi rūḍhiḥ iti / tataś
GR14brhms5cu:101: iti para-brahmatvaṃ ca śrīmad-bhāgavate gūḍhaṃ paraṃ brahma
GR14brhms5cu:117: kāla-rūpeṇa bhagavān tenāyaṃ kṛṣṇa ucyate // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:125: śrī-gītāsu viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat [Gītā 10.42] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:126: śrī-gopāla-tāpanyām-eko vaśī sarvagaḥ kṛṣṇa īḍyaḥ [GTU 1.19] iti / yasmād
GR14brhms5cu:130: yasmin / tad uktaṃ śrī-bhāgavate --reme ramābhir nija-kāma-samplutaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:131: [BhP 10.59.43] iti / nāyaṃ śriyo'ṅga u nitānta-rateḥ prasādaḥ [BhP 10.47.60]
GR14brhms5cu:132: ityādi / tatrātiśuśubhe tābhir bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ [BhP 10.33.6] iti / tābhir
GR14brhms5cu:135: ca / atraivāgre vakṣyate - śriyaḥ kāntāḥ kāntaḥ parama-puruṣaḥ [BrahmaS
GR14brhms5cu:136: 5.56] iti / tāpanyāṃ ca -kṛṣṇo vai paramaṃ daivatam [GTU 1.3] iti / yasmād eva
GR14brhms5cu:140: āhopāyaṃ tam evādya uddhavo yam uvāca ha // [BhP 10.72.15] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:141: ṭīkā ca svāmi-pādānām - ādyo hariḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa ity eṣā /
GR14brhms5cu:146: na caitad āditvaṃ tad-avatārāpekṣaṃ kintu anādi na vidyate ādir yasya
GR14brhms5cu:147: tādṛśaḥ / tāpanyāṃ ca -- eko vaśī sarvagaḥ kṛṣṇa īḍyaḥ ity uktvāha nityo
GR14brhms5cu:148: nityānām iti ca yasmād eva tādṛśatayā ādis tasmāt sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam /
GR14brhms5cu:149: tathā ca daśame taṃ prati devakī-vākyam -
GR14brhms5cu:151: bhavanti kila viśvātmaṃs taṃ tvādyāhaṃ gatiṃ gatā // [BhP 10.85.31] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:152: ṭīkā ca - yasyāṃśaḥ puruṣas tasyāṃśo māyā tasyā aṃśā guṇās teṣāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:158: narāj jātāni tattvāni nārāṇīti vidur budhāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:159: tasya tāny ayanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:160: ity anena lakṣito yo nārāyaṇaḥ sa tavāṅgaṃ tvaṃ punar aṅgīty arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:161: śrī-gītāsu viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti / tad evaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:163: ye ca tac-chabdena kṛṣiṇābhyāṃ paramānanda-mātraṃ vācayanti te'pi
GR14brhms5cu:164: īśvarādi-viśeṣaṇais tatra svābhāvikī śaktiṃ manyeran / tasmin na
GR14brhms5cu:165: dvitīyatvena sarva-kāraṇatvena ca vastv-antara-śaktiṃ manyeran / tasmin na
GR14brhms5cu:166: dvitīyatvena sarva-kāraṇatvena ca vastv-antara-śakty-āropāyogāt / tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:168: ko hy evānyāt kaḥ prāṇyād yad eṣa ākāśa
GR14brhms5cu:171: na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate
GR14brhms5cu:175: nanu sva-mate yoga-vṛttau ca sarvākarṣakaṃ parama-bṛhattamānandaḥ kṛṣṇa
GR14brhms5cu:176: ity abhidhānāt avigraha eva sa ity avagamyate ānandasya vigrahānavagamāt /
GR14brhms5cu:177: satyam / kintv ayaṃ paramo'pūrvaḥ pūrva-siddhānanda-vigrahaḥ iti /
GR14brhms5cu:178: sac-cid-ānanda-lakṣaṇo yo vigrahas tad-rūpa evety arthaḥ / tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:179: śrī-daśame brahmaṇaḥ stave tvayy eva nitya-sukha-bodha-tanāv iti /
GR14brhms5cu:184: sattvaṃ khalv avyabhicāritvam ucyate tad-rūpatvaṃ ca tasya
GR14brhms5cu:186: satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ satyam atra pratiṣṭhitam /
GR14brhms5cu:187: satyāt satyaṃ ca govindas tasmāt satyo hi nāmataḥ // [Mbh 5.68.12] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:196: svasthaḥ śete mṛtyur asmād apaiti // [BhP 10.3.24] ity ādi /
GR14brhms5cu:197: eko'si prathamam [BhP 10.14.18] ity ādi śrī-brahmaṇo vākye tad amitaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:200: yasmāt kṣaram atīto'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:201: ato'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:203: janma-jarābhyāṃ bhinnaḥ sthānur ayam acchedyo'yaṃ yo'sau saurye tiṣṭhati /
GR14brhms5cu:210: yamunā, tad adūra-deśe vṛndāvane ity arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:213: brahmaṇā ekas tvam ātmā ity ādau svayaṃ jyotīr iti / tāpanyāṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:223: ca śrī-daśame brahma-stavānte - brahman parodbhave kṛṣṇe [BhP 10.14.49]
GR14brhms5cu:226: vidito 'si bhavān sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ
GR14brhms5cu:232: tato jīvavad dehitvaṃ tasya nety api
GR14brhms5cu:235: kṛṣṇam enam avehi tvam ātmānam akhilātmanām /
GR14brhms5cu:236: jagad-dhitāya so'py atra dehīvābhāti māyayā // [BhP 10.14.55] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:248: tad evam api svābhīṣṭa-rūpa-līlā-parikara-viśiṣṭatayā govindatvam eva
GR14brhms5cu:253: cābhyadhāt [BhP 10.27.23] ity uktvā tat prakaraṇārambhe śrī-śuka-prārthanā
GR14brhms5cu:254: prīyān na indro gavām [BhP 10.26.25] iti gavāṃ sarvāśrayatvād
GR14brhms5cu:258: gobhyo yajñāḥ pravartante gobhyo devāḥ samutthitāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:260: astu tāvat parama-golokāvatīrṇānāṃ tāsāṃ gavām indratvam iti tāpanīṣu ca
GR14brhms5cu:261: brahmaṇā tadīyam eva svenārādhanaṃ prakāśitam -- govindaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:264: tathaiva daśame -- tad bhūri bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyām
GR14brhms5cu:265: [BhP 10.14.34] ity ādi, śrī-nanda-nandanatvenaiva ca taṃ labdhuṃ prārthanā /
GR14brhms5cu:266: naumīḍya te'bhra-vapuṣe taḍid-ambarāya ity ādi paśupāṅgajāya [BhP 10.14.1]
GR14brhms5cu:268: tad evaṃ govinda-śabdasya nānā-pāramaiśvarya-mayy anyārthatāpi tena
GR14brhms5cu:276: anayor vallabhaḥ proktaḥ svāmī kṛṣṇākhya īśvaraḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:280: prakṛtim iti māyākhyāṃ jagat-kāraṇa-śaktim ity arthaḥ tattva-samūhako
GR14brhms5cu:282: anayor āśrayaḥ sāndrānandaṃ paraṃ jyotir īśvarao
GR14brhms5cu:285: prakṛtir iti svarūpa-bhūtā māyātītā vaikuṇṭhādau prakāśamānā
GR14brhms5cu:289: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna
GR14brhms5cu:292: tad evam atrāpi nanda-nandanatvam evābhimataṃ śrī-gargeṇa ca yathoktam /
GR14brhms5cu:293: prāg ayaṃ vāsudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ [BhP 10.8.14] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:295: hi tasya śrī-vasudevasyāpi manasy āvirbhūtatvam evābhimatam /
GR14brhms5cu:298: api dadhāra sarvātmakam ātma-bhūtaṃ kāṣṭhā yathānanda-karaṃ manastaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:299: [BhP 10.2.18] ity ādeḥ / śrī-vrajeśvarayo'pi tathāsīd eva phalena
GR14brhms5cu:302: pūrvāvyavahita-kālaṃ vyāpya tathā tathā sarvatra darśanāt /
GR14brhms5cu:316: pratibandhakaṃ iti sādhūktaṃ prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya iti /
GR14brhms5cu:317: atha śrī-śukadevena tathaiva nirṇītaṃ nāyaṃ sukhāpo bhagavān dehināṃ
GR14brhms5cu:323: atha viśeṣaḥ śrī-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇyāṃ nandas tv ātmaja
GR14brhms5cu:327: atha tasya tad-rūpatā-sādhakaṃ nityaṃ dhāma pratipādayati sahasra-patraṃ
GR14brhms5cu:329: sahasrāṇi patrāṇi yatra tat kamalam / bhūmiś
GR14brhms5cu:333: mahā-bhagavato vā padaṃ mahā-vaikuṇṭhādi-rūpaṃ ity arthaḥ / rūḍhir
GR14brhms5cu:336: bhagavān gokuleśvaraḥ iti śīlārthe tv atra varac-pratyayaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:343: tasya svarūpam āha tad iti / anantasya
GR14brhms5cu:353: mukhya-pīṭham idam ity āha karṇikāram iti dvayena /
GR14brhms5cu:355: yat prakṛtir eva sarvatra mantratvena pūjārthaṃ likhyate ity arthaḥ / yantram
GR14brhms5cu:356: eva darśayati ṣaṭ-koṇā abhyantare yasya tat /
GR14brhms5cu:363: yasyāḥ sā ṣaṭ-padī śrīmad-aṣṭādaśākṣarī tasyāḥ sthānam / prakṛtir
GR14brhms5cu:378: varṇa-rūpatvenāgre uddhariṣyate kāmaḥ kṛṣṇāya iti / yathoktaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:387: kvacid durgāyā adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ śakti-śaktimator abheda-vivakṣayā yathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:389: rādhā durgā śivā durgā lakṣmī durgā prakīrtitā /
GR14brhms5cu:392: yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saiva durgā syād yā durgā kṛṣṇa eva saḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:393: anayor antarādarśī saṃsārān no vimucyate // ity ādi /
GR14brhms5cu:394: ataḥ svayam eva śrī-kṛṣṇas tatra svarūpa-śakti-rūpeṇa durgā nāmeti / tasmān
GR14brhms5cu:397: durgārādhanādi bahu-prayāsena gamyate jñāyate iti / tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:399: jānāty ekā parā-kāntaṃ saiva durgā tad-ātmikā /
GR14brhms5cu:402: muhūrtād eva devasya prāptir bhavati nānyathā //
GR14brhms5cu:409: yayā mugdhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sarva-dehābhimānataḥ // iti ca /
GR14brhms5cu:410: tathā ca sammohana-tantre jayāṃ prati śrī-durgā-vacanaṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:411: yan nāmnā nāmnī durgāhaṃ guṇair guṇavatī hy aham /
GR14brhms5cu:412: yad-vaibhavā mahā-lakṣmī rādhā nityāparā dvayā // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:413: kiṃ ca prema-rūpā ye ānanda-mahānanda-rasās tat paripāka-bhedās
GR14brhms5cu:414: tad-ātmakena tathā jyotī-rūpeṇa sva-prakāśakena manunā mantra-rūpeṇa
GR14brhms5cu:415: kāma-bījena saṅgatam iti mūlāntargatatve'pi kāma-bījasya pṛthag-uktiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:418: tad evaṃ tad-dhāmoktvā tad-āvaraṇāny āha tad ity ardhena / tasya
GR14brhms5cu:420: arthaḥ / tac ca tad-aṃśānāṃ tasminn aṃśodāyo vidyate yeṣāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:425: viveśa goṣṭhaṃ sa-balo gopīnāṃ nayanotsavaḥ // [BhP 10.36.15] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:426: kaṃsa-vadhānte śrī-vraja-rājaṃ prati svayaṃ bhagavatā - jñātīn vo draṣṭum
GR14brhms5cu:437: rukmiṇī dvāravatyāṃ tu rādhā vṛndāvane vane //
GR14brhms5cu:444: ucchrita-prāntānāṃ vartmāṇy agrima-sandhiṣu tu goṣṭhāni jñeyāni /
GR14brhms5cu:445: akhaṇḍa-kamalasya gokulatvāt tathaiva gokula-samāveśāc ca goṣṭhaṃ tathaiva
GR14brhms5cu:450: prabhāvaḥ satyaḥ śrī-parama-puruṣas taṃ kila bhaje //
GR14brhms5cu:453: tatra go-saṅkhyair iti tu pāṭhaḥ samañjasaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:457: prakaṭitaḥ prabhāvaḥ yena saḥ parama-puruṣaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa ity arthaḥ //4// **************************************************************
GR14brhms5cu:460: caturbhiḥ puruṣārthaiś ca caturbhir hetubhir vṛtam /
GR14brhms5cu:461: śūlair daśabhir ānaddham ūrdhvādho dig-vidikṣv api // // BrS_5.7 //
GR14brhms5cu:462: aṣṭabhir nidhibhir juṣṭam aṣṭabhiḥ siddhibhis tathā
GR14brhms5cu:463: manu-rūpaiś ca daśabhir dik-pālaiḥ parito vṛtam // // BrS_5.8 //
GR14brhms5cu:464: śyāmair gauraiś ca raktaiś ca śuklaiś ca pārṣadarṣabhaiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:466: atha gokulāvaraṇāny āha caturasram iti caturbhiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:468: sarvataś caturasraṃ catuṣkoṇātmakaṃ sthānaṃ śvetadvīpākhyam / tad etad
GR14brhms5cu:477: tatra-viśuddhātmā idaṃ sarvaṃ krameṇa ca ity ādikam uktvā tan-madhye
GR14brhms5cu:478: vṛndāvanaṃ kusumitaṃ nānā-vṛkṣa-vihaṅgamaṃ saṃsmaret ity uktam / tathā
GR14brhms5cu:479: ca bṛhad-vāmane śrutīnāṃ prārthanā pūrvakāṇi padyāni
GR14brhms5cu:480: ānanda-mātram iti yad vadanti hi purāvidaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:481: tad-rūpe darśayāsmākaṃ yadi deyo varo hi naḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:482: śrutvaitad darśayāmāsa svaṃ lokaṃ prakṛteḥ param /
GR14brhms5cu:484: yatra vṛndāvanaṃ nāma vanaṃ kāma-dughair drumaiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:498: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra chandobhiḥ stūyamānaṃ suvismitāḥ iti
GR14brhms5cu:500: tad evaṃ goloka-nāmā ayaṃ lokaḥ śrī-bhāgavate sādhitaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:502: kṛṣṇe ca sannatiṃ teṣāṃ jñātibhyo vismito 'bravīt //
GR14brhms5cu:503: te cautsukya-dhiyo rājan matvā gopās tam īśvaram /
GR14brhms5cu:504: api naḥ svagatiṃ sūkṣmām upādhāsyad adhīśvaram //
GR14brhms5cu:505: iti svānāṃ sa bhagavān vijñāyākhila-dṛk svayam /
GR14brhms5cu:508: uccāvacāsu gatiṣu na veda svāṃ gatiṃ bhraman //
GR14brhms5cu:510: darśayāmāsa lokaṃ svaṃ gopānāṃ tamasaḥ param //
GR14brhms5cu:511: satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ yat brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam /
GR14brhms5cu:512: yad dhi paśyanti munayo guṇāpāye samāhitāḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:513: te tu brahma-hradaṃ nītā magnāḥ kṛṣṇena coddhṛtāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:516: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra cchandobhiḥ stūyamānaṃ suvismitāḥ // [BhP 10.28.10-17] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:523: iti śeṣaḥ / jano'sau vraja-vāsī mama svajanaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:525: ity ādi padye janā itivad ubhayatrāpy anya-janatvam aprastutatam iti /
GR14brhms5cu:526: vraja-janasya tu tadīya-svajanatamatvaṃ tena svayam eva vibhāvitam -
GR14brhms5cu:528: gopāye svātma-yogena so'yaṃ me vrata āhitaḥ // [BhP 10.25.18] ity anena /
GR14brhms5cu:529: sa etasmin prāpañcike loke avidyābhir yā uccāvacā deva-tiryag-ādi-rūpā
GR14brhms5cu:530: gatayas tāsu svāṃ gatiṃ bhraman tan-miśratayābhivyakteḥ tan-nirviśeṣatayā
GR14brhms5cu:531: jānan, tām eva svāṃ gatiṃ bhaved ity arthaḥ madīya-laukika-līlāveśena
GR14brhms5cu:543: atha śrī-vṛndāvane tādṛśa-darśanaṃ katama-deśa-sthitānāṃ teṣām ity ata
GR14brhms5cu:545: brahma-hradaṃ akrūra-tīrthaṃ kṛṣṇena nītā punaś ca tenaiva
GR14brhms5cu:546: magnāḥ majjitāḥ punaś ca tasmāt tenaivoddhṛtāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:557: arthaḥ / purā purāṇe nikaṭe prabandhātīta-bhāviṣu iti koṣa-kārāḥ / seyaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:558: ca paripāṭī tat tīrthaṃ mahimānaṃ lakṣyam eva vidhātum iti bhāvaḥ / tatra
GR14brhms5cu:559: svāṃ gatim iti tadīyatā-nirdeśo gopānāṃ svaṃ lokam iti ṣaṣṭhī-sva-śabdayor
GR14brhms5cu:560: nirdeśaḥ / kṛṣṇam iti sākṣān-nirdeśaś ca vaikuṇṭhāntaraṃ vyavacchidya
GR14brhms5cu:564: tatra soma-gatiś caiva jyotiṣāṃ ca mahātmanām //
GR14brhms5cu:565: tasyopari gavāṃ lokaḥ sādhyās taṃ pālayanti hi /
GR14brhms5cu:566: sa hi sarva-gataḥ kṛṣṇa mahākāśa-gato mahān //
GR14brhms5cu:567: upary upari tatrāpi gatis tava tapomayī /
GR14brhms5cu:568: yāṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve pṛcchanto'pi pitāmaham /
GR14brhms5cu:570: brāhmye tapasi yuktānāṃ brahma-lokaḥ parā gatiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:571: gavām eva tu yo loko durāroho hi sā gatiḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:572: sa tu lokas tvayā kṛṣṇa sīdamānaḥ kṛtātmanā /
GR14brhms5cu:573: dhṛto dhṛtimatā vīra nighantopdadravān gavām // [HV 2.19.29-35] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:574: tatrāpāta-pratītārthāntare svargād ūrdhvaṃ brahmaṇo loka ity ayuktaṃ syāt
GR14brhms5cu:576: tatra soma-gatiś caivety api na sambhavati
GR14brhms5cu:577: candrasyānyeṣām api jyotiṣāṃ dhruva-lokādhastād eva gateḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:584: surabhi-lokatve sati sarva-gata ity anupapannaṃ syāt /
GR14brhms5cu:585: śrī-bhagavad-vigraha-lokayor acintya-śaktitvena vibhutvaṃ ghaṭate na punar
GR14brhms5cu:586: asyeti / ataiva sarvātītatvāt tatrāpi tava gatir ity api śabdo vismaye prayuktaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:587: yāṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve ity-ādikaṃ coktam /
GR14brhms5cu:588: tasmāt prākṛta-golokād anya evāsau goloka iti siddham / tathā ca
GR14brhms5cu:591: brahma-lokaṃ ca kaunteya golokaṃ ca sanātanam // [Mbh 12.330.68] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:595: iti dvitīyānusāreṇa svar-lokam ārabhya satya-loka-paryantaṃ loka-pañcakam
GR14brhms5cu:596: ucyate / tasmād ūrdhvam upari brahma-loko brahmātmako loko brahma-lokaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:600: satya-lokas tu brahma-lokaḥ sanātanaḥ [BhP 2.5.38] iti dvitīyāt /
GR14brhms5cu:617: vartata iti somaḥ śrī-śivas tasya gatiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:619: viriñcatām eti tataḥ paraṃ hi mām /
GR14brhms5cu:624: someti supāṃ sulug ity ādinā ṣaṣṭhyā luk chāndasaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:627: jyotir brahma tad-aikātmya-bhāvānāṃ muktānām ity arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:628: nanu tādṛśām api sarveṣāṃ kintu mahātmanāṃ mahāśayānāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:634: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ // [Gītā 6.47] iti
GR14brhms5cu:638: sarvordhva-pradeśe gavāṃ lokaḥ śrī-goloka ity arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:641: nitya-tadīya-deva-gaṇāḥ pālayanti dik-pālatayā vartante te ha nākaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:642: mahimānaḥ sacantaḥ yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ [Rk 10.90.16] iti śruteḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:643: tatra pūrve ye ca sādhyā viśve devāḥ sanātanāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:644: te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacantaḥ śubha-darśanāḥ // iti
GR14brhms5cu:646: yad vā tad bhūri-bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyāṃ yad gokule'pi
GR14brhms5cu:663: tad evam upary upari sarvopary api virājamāne tatra śrī-goloke'pi tava gatiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:665: ataiva sā ca gatiḥ sādhāraṇī na bhavati kintu tapomayī /
GR14brhms5cu:666: tapo'trānavacchinnaiśvaryaṃ sahasra-nāma-bhāṣye'pi paramaṃ yo mahat tapaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:671: āha yām iti / adhunā tasya śrī-goloka ity ākhyā bījam abhivyañjayati gatir
GR14brhms5cu:679: ity-uktānusāreṇa atraiva nighnatopadravān gavām ity uktyā ca
GR14brhms5cu:680: goloka-vāsi-mātrāṇāṃ svatas tad-bhāva-bhāvitānāṃ ca sādhana-vaśād ity
GR14brhms5cu:683: varṇayitvā tasya gokulena sahābhedam āha sa tv iti /
GR14brhms5cu:684: sa eva tu sa loko dhṛto rakṣitaḥ śrī-govardhanoddharaṇeneti / evam eva
GR14brhms5cu:687: brahma-lokaṃ ca kaunteya golokaṃ ca sanātanam // [Mbh 12.330.68] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:689: ekadā sāntarīkṣāc ca vaikuṇṭhaṃ svecchayā bhuvi /
GR14brhms5cu:691: bhakti-rūpāṃ satāṃ bhaktim utpāditavatī bhṛśam // iti /
GR14brhms5cu:693: tat sarvopari goloke śrī-govindaḥ sadā svayam /
GR14brhms5cu:700: vyākhyātaṃ ca - tāṃ tāni vāṃ yuvayoḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmayor vāstūni līlā-sthānāni
GR14brhms5cu:703: bhūri-śṛṅgā mahā-śṛṅgyo gāvo bahu-śubha-lakṣaṇā iti vā /
GR14brhms5cu:707: bhūmau tal-loke vede ca prasiddhaṃ śrī-golokākhyaṃ urugāyasya svayaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:708: bhagavato tac-caraṇāravindasya paramaṃ prapañcātītaṃ padaṃ sthānaṃ bhūri
GR14brhms5cu:710: yajuḥsu - mādhyandinīyā stūyate dhāmāny uśmasi ity ādau / viṣṇoḥ
GR14brhms5cu:711: paramaṃ padam avabhātīti bhūrīti cātra prakārāntaraṃ paṭhanti śeṣaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:713: evaṃ jyotir-mayo devaḥ sad-ānandaṃ parāt paraḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:722: napuṃsakatvaṃ vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma iti śruteḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:726: yatra māyā kim utāpare harer anuvratā yatra surāsurārcitāḥ [BhP 2.9.10] //6// **************************************************************
GR14brhms5cu:728: ātmanā ramayā reme tyakta-kālaṃ sisṛkṣayā / // BrS_5.11 //
GR14brhms5cu:729: niyatiḥ sā ramā devi tat-priyā tad-vaśaṃ tadā //
GR14brhms5cu:730: atha prapañcātmanas tad-aṃśasya puruṣasya tu na tādṛśatvam ity āha
GR14brhms5cu:735: ātmanā antarvṛtyā tu ramayā svarūpa-śaktyaiva reme ratiṃ prāpnoti / bahir
GR14brhms5cu:740: atra -māyāṃ vyudasya cic-chaktyā kaivalye sthita ātmani [BhP 1.7.23] iti
GR14brhms5cu:743: tatrāha / sisṛkṣayā sraṣṭum icchayā tyaktaḥ sṛṣṭy-arthaṃ prahitaḥ kālaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:744: yasmāt ramaṇāt tādṛśaṃ yathā syāt tathā reme /
GR14brhms5cu:746: sugamaḥ / tat prabhāva-rūpeṇa tenaiva sā sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:747: prabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ prāhuḥ kālam eke yato bhayam [BhP 3.26.16]
GR14brhms5cu:751: nanu ramaiva sā kā tatrāha niyatir ity ardhena /
GR14brhms5cu:753: bhagavatyeva nityatā bhavatīti niyatiḥ svarūpa-bhūtā tac-chaktiḥ / devī
GR14brhms5cu:756: bhagavatī śrīḥ śākṣād ātmano hareḥ [BhP 12.11.20] iti / ṭīkā ca --
GR14brhms5cu:758: tatra hetuḥ sākṣād ātmana iti svarūpasya
GR14brhms5cu:759: cid-rūpatvāt tasyās tad-abhedād ity arthaḥ / ity eṣā /
GR14brhms5cu:760: atra sākṣāt-śabdena vilajjamānayā yasya sthātum īkṣā-pathe'muyā ity
GR14brhms5cu:763: nityaiva sā jagan-mātā viṣṇoḥ śrīr anapāyinī
GR14brhms5cu:764: yathā sarva-gato viṣṇus tathaiveyaṃ dvijottamaḥ // [ViP 1.8.17] iti /
GR14brhms5cu:766: avatāraṃ karoty eṣā tathā śrīs tat-sahāyinī // [ViP 1.9.142] iti ca /
GR14brhms5cu:767: devatve deva-dehā sā mānuṣatve ca mānuṣī /
GR14brhms5cu:768: harer dehānṛ-rūpāṃ vai karoty eṣātmanas tanum // [ViP 1.9.145] iti ca /
GR14brhms5cu:769: hayaśīrṣa-pañcarātre - na viṣṇunā vinā devī na hariḥ padmajāṃ vinā iti // 7 // **************************************************************
GR14brhms5cu:771: yā yoniḥ sāparā śaktiḥ kāmo bījaṃ mahad dhareḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:776: viśva-śaktir iyaṃ sthitā iti viṣṇu-purāṇānusāreṇa prapañcātmanas
GR14brhms5cu:778: puruṣasya liṅgaṃ liṅga-sthānīyaḥ yaḥ prapañcotpādako'ṃśaḥ sa eva
GR14brhms5cu:779: śambhuḥ / anyas tu tad-āvirbhāva-viśeṣatvād eva śambhur ucyate ity arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:780: vakṣyate ca kṣīraṃ yathā dadhi-vikāra-viśeṣa-yogād sañjāyate na tu tataḥ
GR14brhms5cu:782: tathā tasya vīryāvadhāna-sthāna-rūpāyā māyāyā apy aprakaṭa-rūpāyā yā
GR14brhms5cu:783: yonir yoni-sthānīyo'ṃśaḥ saivāparā pradhānākhyā śaktir iti pūrvavat / tatra
GR14brhms5cu:784: ca hares tasya puruṣākhya-hary-aṃśasya kāmo bhavati sṛṣṭy-arthaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:789: vastutas tu pūrvābhiprāyatvam evety āha liṅgety ardhena /
GR14brhms5cu:794: śaktimān ity ardhena tad evānūdya tasmin pūrvoktāprakaṭa-rūpasya
GR14brhms5cu:795: prakaṭa-rūpatayāpunar abhivyaktir ity āha tasminn ity ardhena / tasmāl
GR14brhms5cu:797: maheśvaro'py ucyate tataś ca tasmin bhūta-sūkṣma-paryantatāṃ prāpte liṅge
GR14brhms5cu:798: svayaṃ tad-aṃśī mahā-viṣṇur āvirabhūt prakaṭa-rūpeṇāvirbhavati / yato
GR14brhms5cu:799: jagatāṃ sarveṣāṃ parāvareṣāṃ jīvānāṃ sa eva patir iti // 10 // **************************************************************
GR14brhms5cu:805: sahasraṃ sūte sṛjati yaḥ sa sahasra-sūḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:810: sahasra-śīrṣety ukto līlā-vigrahaḥ parasya bhūmnaḥ ādyo'vatāraḥ iti //11// **************************************************************
GR14brhms5cu:811: nārāyaṇaḥ sa bhagavān āpas tasmāt sanātanāt /
GR14brhms5cu:813: yoga-nidrāṃ gatas tasmin sahasrāṃśaḥ svayaṃ mahān //
GR14brhms5cu:814: ayam eva kāraṇārṇavaśāyīty āha nārāyaṇa iti sārdhena / tāḥ āpa eva
GR14brhms5cu:815: kāraṇārṇo-nidhir āvirāsīt sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇātmakaḥ iti / pūrvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:818: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai nara-sūnavaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:822: tasmād eva brahmāṇḍānām utpattim āha tad rometi /
GR14brhms5cu:824: tasya saṅkarṣaṇātmakasya yad bījaṃ yoni-śaktāvadhyas taṃ tad eva pūrvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:825: bhūta-sūkṣma-paryantatāṃ prāptaṃ sat paścāt tasya loma-bila-jāleṣu vivareṣu
GR14brhms5cu:826: antarbhūtaṃ ca sat haimāni aṇḍāni jātāni tāni cāpañcī-kṛtāṃśaiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:836: praty-aṇḍam evam ekāṃśād ekāṃśād viśati svayam / // BrS_5.18 //
GR14brhms5cu:838: tataś ca teṣu brahmāṇḍeṣu pṛthak pṛthak svarūpaiḥ svarūpāntaraiḥ sa eva
GR14brhms5cu:844: punaḥ kiṃ cakāra tatrāha - vāmāṅgād iti /
GR14brhms5cu:846: brahmāṇḍānāṃ pālakādayaḥ prati brahmāṇḍāntaḥ sthitānāṃ viṣṇv-ādīnāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:851: hiraṇyagarbha-rūpa eva na tu vakṣyamāṇa-caturmukha-rūpa eva, so'yaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:858: tatra śambhoḥ kāryāntaram apy āha ahaṅkārātmakam ity ardhena / etad
GR14brhms5cu:862: atha tais tri-vidhair veśair līlām udvahataḥ kila /
GR14brhms5cu:863: yoga-nidrā bhagavatī tasya śrīr iva saṅgatā //
GR14brhms5cu:864: brahmāṇḍa-praviṣṭasya tu tat-tad-rūpasya līlām āha atha tair ity ādi / tais tat
GR14brhms5cu:865: sadṛśais trividhaiḥ prati-brahmāṇḍa-gata-viṣṇv-ādibhir veśai rūpair līlāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:871: tatra yathā śrīr apy aṃśena saṅgatā tathā sāpīty arthaḥ //17// **************************************************************
GR14brhms5cu:872: sisṛkṣāyāṃ tato nābhes tasya padmaṃ viniryayau /
GR14brhms5cu:878: samavāyāprayogāc ca vibhinnāni pṛthak pṛthak // // BrS_5.23 //
GR14brhms5cu:881: tathā asaṅkhya-jīvātmakasya samaṣṭi-jīvasya prabodhaṃ vaktuṃ punaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:885: parasparaṃ tattvāni yojayann iti yojanānantaram eva nirīhatayā yoga-nidrām
GR14brhms5cu:887: yojayitvā tu tāny eva praviveśa svayaṃ guhām /
GR14brhms5cu:888: guhāṃ praviṣṭe tasmiṃs tu jīvātmā pratibudhyate //
GR14brhms5cu:893: sa nityo nitya-sambandhaḥ prakṛtiś ca paraiva sā //
GR14brhms5cu:894: jīvasya svābhāvikī sthitim āha sa nity ity ardheneti /
GR14brhms5cu:898: rañjitaṃ guṇa-rāgeṇa sa jīva iti kathyate //
GR14brhms5cu:904: pramātṛ-rūpeṇa prakṛtim iva prāptaś cety arthaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:907: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā iti śrutiś ca
GR14brhms5cu:909: evaṃ sarvātma-sambandhaṃ nābhyāṃ padmaṃ harer abhūt /
GR14brhms5cu:911: atha tasya samaṣṭi-jīvāsthānaṃ guhā-praviṣṭāt puruṣād udbhūtam ity āha
GR14brhms5cu:912: evam iti / tataḥ samaṣṭi-dehābhimāninas tasya hiraṇya-garbha-brahmaṇas
GR14brhms5cu:914: sa jāto bhagavac-chaktyā tat-kālaṃ kila coditaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:916: dadarśa kevalaṃ dhvāntaṃ nānyat kim api sarvataḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:917: atha tasya caturmukhasya ceṣṭām āha sa jāta ity sārdhena / spaṣṭam // 23 // **************************************************************
GR14brhms5cu:918: uvāca puratas tasmai tasya divya sarasvatī /
GR14brhms5cu:919: kāmaḥ kṛṣṇāya govinda he gopī-jana ity api /
GR14brhms5cu:920: vallabhāya priyā vahner mantram te dāsyati priyam //
GR14brhms5cu:923: tapas tvaṃ tapa etena tava siddhir bhaviṣyati //
GR14brhms5cu:924: etad eva sparśeṣu yat ṣoḍaśam ekaviṃśam iti tṛtīya-skandhānusāreṇa yojayati
GR14brhms5cu:926: atha tepe sa suciraṃ prīṇan govindam avyayam /
GR14brhms5cu:927: śvetadvīpa-patiṃ kṛṣṇaṃ goloka-sthaṃ parāt param // // BrS_5.31 //
GR14brhms5cu:934: sa tu tena mantreṇa sva-kāmanā-viśeṣānusārāt sṛṣṭikṛt-śakti-viśiṣṭatayā
GR14brhms5cu:936: upāsitavān ity āha -- atha tepe ity ādi caturbhiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:938: sattva-rajas-tamo-guṇa-mayyā rūpiṇyā mūrtimatyā paryupāsitaṃ paritas tad
GR14brhms5cu:942: balim udvahanty ajayā nimiṣā iti ca
GR14brhms5cu:949: tad evaṃ dīkṣātaḥ parastād eva tasya dhruvasyeva dvijatva-saṃskāras
GR14brhms5cu:950: tad-ārādhitāt tan-mantrādhidevāj jātaḥ ity āha atha veṇv iti dvayena /
GR14brhms5cu:959: tataś ca trayīm api tasmāt prāpya tam eva tuṣṭāvety āha trayyeti / keśān
GR14brhms5cu:961: aṃśavo ye prakāśante mam te keśa-saṃjñitāḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:962: sarvajñāḥ keśavaṃ tasmān mām āhur muni-sattamāḥ //
GR14brhms5cu:971: ca pīṭheṣu satsv api madhyasthatvena mukhyatayā prathamaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:976: kadācid rahasi tu vailakṣaṇyam ity āha lakṣmīti
GR14brhms5cu:982: tad evaṃ cintāmaṇi-prakara-sadma-mayīṃ kathā-gānaṃ nāṭyaṃ gamanam
GR14brhms5cu:985: dvitīya-pīṭha-gatāṃ līlām āha veṇum iti dvayena /
GR14brhms5cu:993: praṇaya-pūrvako yaḥ keli-parihāsas tatra yā vaidagdhī saiva
GR14brhms5cu:1000: tad evaṃ līlā-dvayam uktvā paramācintya-śaktyā vaibhava-viśeṣān āha
GR14brhms5cu:1002: tatra śrī-vigrahasya aṅgāni hasto'pi draṣṭuṃ śaknoti,
GR14brhms5cu:1004: tathā anyad anyad apy aṅgam anyad anyat

GR14brhms5cu:1300: gopakaiḥ sahitas tatra kṣaṇam ekaṃ dine dine /

GR14brhms5cu:1504: ataiva sarveśvaras tu parjanyavad draṣṭavyaḥ iti nyāyena
GR14brhms5cu:1505: karmānurūpa-phala-dātṛtvena sāmye'pi bhakte tu pakṣapāta-viśeṣaṃ karotīty
GR14brhms5cu:1507: samo'haṃ sarva-bhūteṣu na me dveṣo'sti na priyaḥ /

GR14brhms5cu:1509: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate /
GR14brhms5cu:1510: teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yoga-kṣemaṃ vahāmy aham // [Gītā 9.22] iti ca
GR14brhms5cu:1514: sañcintya tasya sadṛśīṃ tanum āpur ete
GR14brhms5cu:1516: ya eva ca vairbhyo'py anya-durlabha-phalaṃ dadāti kim uta
GR14brhms5cu:1519: iti bhajāmīty anta-prakaraṇam upasaṃharati yaṃ krodheti /
GR14brhms5cu:1534: śuddhāṃ bhāgavatīṃ tanum iti śrī-nārada-vākyasya ca dṛṣṭyā sarvathā
GR14brhms5cu:1536: vaireṇa yaṃ nṛpatayaḥ ity ādau anurakta-dhiyām
GR14brhms5cu:1537: punaḥ kim ity anurakta-dhīṣu suṣṭhv iti / anena
GR14brhms5cu:1538: goloka-stha-prapañcāvatīrṇayor ekatvam eva darśitam / tad uktaṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:1542: kathā gānaṃ nāṭyaṃ gamanam api vaṃśī priya-sakhi
GR14brhms5cu:1543: cid-ānandaṃ jyotiḥ param api tad āsvādyam api ca // // BrS_5.65 //
GR14brhms5cu:1544: sa yatra kṣīrābdhiḥ sravati surabhībhyaś ca su-mahān
GR14brhms5cu:1545: nimeṣārdhākhyo vā vrajati na hi yatrāpi samayaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1546: bhaje śvetadvīpaṃ tam aham iha golokam iti yaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1548: tad evaṃ nijeṣṭa-devaṃ bhajanīyatvena stutvā tena viśiṣṭaṃ tal lokaṃ tathā
GR14brhms5cu:1552: tāsām anantānām apy eka eva kāntaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1553: iti parama-nārāyaṇādibhyo'pi tasya tat-tal-lokebhyo'pi tadīya-lokasya cāsya
GR14brhms5cu:1555: kalpa-taravo drumāḥ iti teṣāṃ sarveṣām eva
GR14brhms5cu:1557: bhūmir ity ādikaṃ ca tadvad bhūmir api sarva-spṛhāṃ dadāti kim uta
GR14brhms5cu:1559: toyam apy amṛtam iva svādu kim utāmṛtam ity ādi / vaṃśī
GR14brhms5cu:1563: ca nitya-pūrṇa-candratvāt tathā tad eva param api tat tat prakāśyam apīty
GR14brhms5cu:1565: tathā tad eva teṣām āsvādyaṃ bhogyam api ca cic-chaktimayatvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1566: darśayāmāsa lokaṃ svaṃ gopānāṃ tamasaḥ param [BhP 10.28.14] iti
GR14brhms5cu:1571: gandha-rūpaṃ svādu-rūpaṃ dravyaṃ puṣpādikaṃ ca yat /
GR14brhms5cu:1572: heyāṃśānām abhāvāc ca rasa-rūpaṃ bhavec ca tat //
GR14brhms5cu:1573: tvag-bījaṃ caiva heyāṃśaṃ kaṭhināṃśaṃ ca yad bhavet /
GR14brhms5cu:1574: sarvaṃ tad bhautikaṃ viddhi nahi bhūtamayaṃ hi tat /

GR14brhms5cu:1576: surabhībhyaś ca saratīti tvadīya-vaṃśī-dhvany-ādy-āveśād iti bhāvaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1577: vrajati nahīti tad-āveśena te tad-vāsinaḥ kālam api na jānantīti bhāvaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1579: na ca kālaḥ vikramaḥ [BhP 2.9.10] iti dvitīyāt /
GR14brhms5cu:1582: tiṣṭhati tathā-bhūmyāṃ hi tiṣṭhati [GTU 2.27] iti tāpanībhyaḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1586: brahman mahattva-vijñāne prajā-sarge ca cen matiḥ /
GR14brhms5cu:1587: pañca-ślokīm imāṃ vidyāṃ vatsa dattāṃ nibodha me //
GR14brhms5cu:1588: tad evaṃ tasya stutim uktvā śrī-bhagavat-prasāda-lābham āha atheti / sarvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1592: tatra prasāda-rūpāṃ pañca-ślokīm āha prabuddha iti /
GR14brhms5cu:1596: bodhayan ātmanātmānaṃ bhaktim apy uttamāṃ labhet //
GR14brhms5cu:1599: pramāṇair bhagavac-chāstrais tat-sadācārais tadīyā ye santas
GR14brhms5cu:1600: teṣām ācārair anusṭānais tad-abhyāsais teṣām eva paunaḥpuṇyena bāhulyena
GR14brhms5cu:1601: ātmanā ātmānaṃ bodhayati svayam eva svaṃ bhagavad-āśritaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1603: tato'py uttamāṃ śuddhāṃ bhaktiṃ labhata iti /
GR14brhms5cu:1609: yasyāḥ śreyas-karaṃ nāsti yayā nirvṛtim āpnuyāt /
GR14brhms5cu:1610: yā sādhayati mām eva bhaktiṃ tām eva sādhayet //
GR14brhms5cu:1611: dharmān anyān parityajya mām ekaṃ bhaja viśvasan /
GR14brhms5cu:1612: yādṛśī yādṛśī śraddhā siddhir bhavati tādṛśī // // BrS_5.71 //
GR14brhms5cu:1614: tenaiva karmaṇā dhyāyan māṃ parāṃ bhaktim icchati //
GR14brhms5cu:1615: punaḥ śuddhām eva sādhana-bhaktiṃ draḍhayann akāmair api tām eva
GR14brhms5cu:1616: kuryād ity āha - dharmān anyān iti / tad uktaṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:1623: tasmāt tava sisṛkṣāpi phaliṣyatīti sa-yuktikam āha - ahaṃ hīti / pradhānaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:1627: kiṃ bahunā tavam api mayā āhitaṃ arpitaṃ teja idaṃ bibharṣi,
GR14brhms5cu:1629: mat-tejasā jaganti sarvāṇi sthāvara-jaṅgamāni he vidhe hi kurv iti //62//
